title: Marsh - Billings - Rockefeller National Historical Park: Teens
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Kids & Youth     Teens               Teens          Internships at the Park  Marsh-Billings-Rockefeller works in partnership with the Student Conservation Association, the Vermont Youth Conservation Corps, the National Park Foundation, and the Upper Valley Trails Alliance to offer meaningful stewardship experiences for youth. Teens can conduct trail maintenance, forest management, interpretive programs, and career explorations. See this document for more program details and application instructions.   Learn about the Internships at the park through the SCA Intern and George Perkins Marsh Youth Intern Blogs!                     Join us on facebook!            YouTube  Find videos from National Parks across the country.  Facebook - #FindYourPark Check out what is going on in parks across the nation!   Twitter  Read tweets about happenings at other national parks.                   Browse Park flickr photos
